diagnosis.final_diagnosis: mild cognitive impairment due to brain vascular disease
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: Mr P exhibited memory problems for over a decade, as evidenced by a decline in his Mini-Mental State Examination (MMSE) scores from 29/30 to 21/30 over this period. Brain imaging revealed white matter changes and bilateral and frontotemporal atrophy, which supported the diagnosis of mild cognitive impairment due to vascular issues.
